summary:
Did you like exporing Blackreach? But did you always got overencumbered all the time? Forcing you to go to the surface to sell?

Then this is the mod for you! This mod adds a nord merchant in Blackreach!
descriptionHtml:
[left][b]Table of content:[/b]
1. Description
2. Installation
3. Uninstallation
4. Problems and bugs
5. Credits
6. Permissions
5. Change notes


[b]1. Mod description[/b]
Did you love exploring Blackreach? But you are always getting overencumbered all the time?
Forcing you to go to the surface to sell, and then back again? Just wasting that precious time?
Then this is the mod for you!

This mod adds the merchant Thorald Blacksheild, a nord merchant who lives deep down in Blackreach, he sells a few things and will buy almost everything. He is a mage and will defend himself with fire spells. The mod also add a alchemy table and a bedroll for him to use.


[b]2. Installation[/b]

1. Download and enable it via the Nexus mod manger or Place .esp file in the data folder
2. Enable it in Skyrim launcher


[b]3.Uninstallation[/b]
Delete the .esp file in the Data folder or remove it with the Nexus mod manger

[b]4.Problems and bugs[/b]
If you have found any bugs or have any problems please PM me or comment.

[b]5. Credits[/b]
- Bethesda Softwork for Skyrim and the creation kit
- Google for their search engine
- Map credits:http://www.giannipc.com/josh/guide/4874-sn=11.4.htm


[b]6. Permissions[/b]
You are free to upload this any where exept Steam workshop and you must credit my as the original creator.


[b]5.Change notes[/b]

0.2
- Merchant now acutally apear in blackreach.
- Added some better screenshots, to show where he is.
- Added a lanter to add some light and to look it more natural.

0.1
- Uploaded to Skyrim nexus.
- Added the merchant npc "Thorald Blackshield".
- Added a alchemy table near Thorald.
- Added a bedroll near Thorald.
- Added a chair near Thorald.
- Cleaned the .esp file with TES5EDIT[/left]
author: ohlsson96
